Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of market trend predictions.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.FORMULA: 1 - (Absolute Error of Market Trend Predictions / Actual Market Trends)

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.KPIS: Timeliness of market trend analysis reports
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.EXPLANATION: Measures the timeliness of market trend analysis reports.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.FORMULA: Number of Reports Delivered On Time / Total Number of Reports Scheduled * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.EXPLANATION: Measures the number of market insights generated.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.FORMULA: Total Count of Unique Market Insights Generated

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.KPIS: Market share growth compared to industry trends
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.EXPLANATION: Measures market share growth against industry trends.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.FORMULA: (Market Share Growth Rate - Industry Average Market Share Growth Rate)

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.EXPLANATION: Measures the effectiveness of market segmentation.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.FORMULA: (Number of Target Segments Successfully Reached / Total Number of Target Segments) * 100

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.EXPLANATION: Measures the accuracy of market trend forecasts.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.FORMULA: 1 - (Absolute Error of Market Trend Forecasts / Actual Market Trends)

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.KPIS: Customer satisfaction with market trend analysis
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.EXPLANATION: Measures customer satisfaction with market trend analysis.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.FORMULA: Average Rating of Customer Satisfaction with Market Trend Analysis

Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.EXPLANATION: Measures the completeness of competitor analysis.
Corporate+Corporate Strategy+Market Tren.FORMULA: (Number of Complete Competitor Analyses / Total Number of Competitors Analyzed) * 100
